page.title: 03Alex Pickering's Typical Day
page.content: I woke up at about 7.30 and went downstairs to get my breakfast. I had Weetabix and a piece of toast. Then I went upstairs to get washed and ready for school. I say goodbye to my mum and then I set off for school at 8.30 and arrive about 8.45. School starts at 8.55. Our first lesson was maths. I enjoy maths quite a lot. Then at 10.30 we had our first break. I played cricket with the boys. Then we listened to Juliet's talk on hamsters which she brought to the class. After lunch we took our PE kit into the classroom to go to games. Our last break was from 2.15 to 2.30. Then we did some work in our notebooks. At 3.25 we went home. I took my dog for a walk and then had my tea. I watched some TV until 10.33 and then I went to bed.
